name: Pixel Heaven: Maze Maker
description:
Pixel Heaven is an exquisite painting puzzle game. Here, you are able to paint lots of vivid pixel paintings even you have no drawing skill. Just count and slide, that's easy!

More than hundreds of levels are waiting for you to challenge. Different themes with different surprise when you complete one of them. Extra mode 'jigsaws' is extremely difficult, welcome to have a try :P

Gameplay:
*New style: Lead a line from an end to another, number shows the length it can extent. Every pixel character can lead out one unfinished line. Learn to use their help to solve the puzzles.
*Puzzle: Sometimes, there are more than one solution of the puzzle. The long lines are usually not that easy to correct. You do really need to think about it when facing too many options.

Features:
*Beautiful Themes and Scenes, are all with dozens of levels in each themes.
*7 lovely pixel characters in total, they would like to accompany with you to experience all the adventures. Wearing different costumes matches different themes.
*Repeatable playing, the levels are not fixed, the next time you start it, it will reset and show a new puzzle.
